title: Machines to move the mail
creator_credit: Harvey Harrison and British Information Services
brief_description: The ideas of London’s Dollis Hill Research Station and of the Post Office of the future. Shows examples of automation in the post office such as “Alf” the automatic letter facer, and “Elsie” electronic letter sorting and indicating equipment, to illustrate the future of a completely mechanised postal service.
